title: "If Somebody Breaks Into My House, They're Getting Shot": Kamala Harris
content: Kamala Harris' remarks came during a star-studded rally hosted by talk show legend Oprah Winfrey.
summary: Kamala Harris' remarks came during a star-studded rally hosted by talk show legend Oprah Winfrey.

title: How Many Days Do People In Various Countries Need To Work To Buy iPhone 16
content: The sale of new series of iPhone has officially begun in India. A new research now shows how people from different regions of the world could afford the new iPhone 16.
summary: The sale of new series of iPhone has officially begun in India. A new research now shows how people from different regions of the world could afford the new iPhone 16.

title: Pagers, Walkie-Talkies Banned On Flights From Lebanon After Deadly Blasts
content: Lebanon has banned walkie-talkies and pagers from flights departing Beirut airport. The decision, announced on Thursday, was made after walkie-talkies and pagers, reportedly used by Hezbollah members, detonated in a deadly attack.
summary: Lebanon has banned walkie-talkies and pagers from flights departing Beirut airport. The decision, announced on Thursday, was made after walkie-talkies and pagers, reportedly used by Hezbollah members, detonated in a deadly attack.

title: Mohamed Al-Fayed, Whose Son Died With Princess Diana, Accused Of Rape
content: Former Harrods boss Mohamed Al-Fayed, whose son Emad El-Din "Dodi" Mohamed Fayed was killed in a 1997 Paris car crash alongside Princess Diana, has been accused of multiple rapes.
summary: Former Harrods boss Mohamed Al-Fayed, whose son Emad El-Din "Dodi" Mohamed Fayed was killed in a 1997 Paris car crash alongside Princess Diana, has been accused of multiple rapes.

title: Harris vs Trump: Who Leads The Race To White House After Debate
content: Kamala Harris is widely perceived as having outperformed Donald Trump in the September 10 presidential debate.
summary: Kamala Harris is widely perceived as having outperformed Donald Trump in the September 10 presidential debate.

title: Hours After Hezbollah Chief's "Revenge" Vow, Israel Bombs Lebanon: 10 Facts
content: Israel unleashed a series of airstrikes on southern Lebanon on Thursday in one of the most intense bombardments seen since the start of cross-border hostilities with armed group Hezbollah on October 7.
summary: Israel unleashed a series of airstrikes on southern Lebanon on Thursday in one of the most intense bombardments seen since the start of cross-border hostilities with armed group Hezbollah on October 7.

title: Thai Woman, 64, Rescued After Being In Python's Grip For 2 Hours
content: A 64-year-old woman in Thailand has been rescued by police after being strangled by a huge python for two hours.
summary: A 64-year-old woman in Thailand has been rescued by police after being strangled by a huge python for two hours.

title: US Cop Shoots Dead Judge Inside His Office After Argument, Arrested
content: A spokesperson for police said the shooting occurred after an argument between Letcher County Sheriff Mickey Stines and judge Kevin Mullins.
summary: A spokesperson for police said the shooting occurred after an argument between Letcher County Sheriff Mickey Stines and judge Kevin Mullins.

title: Dhruvi Patel From US Wins Miss India Worldwide 2024
content: Dhruvi Patel, a Computer Information System student from the USA, has been declared the winner of Miss India Worldwide 2024, the longest running Indian pageant outside of India.
summary: Dhruvi Patel, a Computer Information System student from the USA, has been declared the winner of Miss India Worldwide 2024, the longest running Indian pageant outside of India.

title: West Can't Confine India Into One Narrative: UK Based Sanskrit Scholar
content: Professor James Hegarty, an academic in Sanskrit and Indian Religions, who currently heads the School of History, Archaeology, and Religion at Cardiff University said that the West cannot confine India into a single narrative.
summary: Professor James Hegarty, an academic in Sanskrit and Indian Religions, who currently heads the School of History, Archaeology, and Religion at Cardiff University said that the West cannot confine India into a single narrative.

title: After Court Order, X Goes Offline Again In Brazil
content: Elon Musk's X social media platform went back offline in Brazil Thursday, a day after it resumed service in contravention of a judicial ban, internet providers said.
summary: Elon Musk's X social media platform went back offline in Brazil Thursday, a day after it resumed service in contravention of a judicial ban, internet providers said.

title: Biden To Meet Zelensky Next Week, Discuss War Situation: White House
content: US President Joe Biden will meet Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelenskyy at the White House on September 26, the White House has announced. Zelenskyy will also meet US Vice President Kamala Harris.
summary: US President Joe Biden will meet Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelenskyy at the White House on September 26, the White House has announced. Zelenskyy will also meet US Vice President Kamala Harris.

title: Israel Destroys 1,000 Hezbollah Rocket Launcher Barrels, Says Military
content: Israeli fighter jets pounded Hezbollah targets in southern Lebanon late on Thursday, striking hundreds of rocket launcher barrels that were set to be used to immediately fire toward Israeli territory, the military said.
summary: Israeli fighter jets pounded Hezbollah targets in southern Lebanon late on Thursday, striking hundreds of rocket launcher barrels that were set to be used to immediately fire toward Israeli territory, the military said.

title: Airlines Suspend Flights As Middle East Tensions Rise
content: Concerns over a wider conflict in the Middle East have prompted international airlines to suspend flights to the region or to avoid affected air space.
summary: Concerns over a wider conflict in the Middle East have prompted international airlines to suspend flights to the region or to avoid affected air space.

title: Sri Lanka Elections: A Look At The 5 Key Candidates And What They Stand For
content: Sri Lanka, which is slowly recovering from its worst-ever economic crisis, will vote to elect the next President on Saturday.
summary: Sri Lanka, which is slowly recovering from its worst-ever economic crisis, will vote to elect the next President on Saturday.

title: Diplomatic Solution To Israel-Hezbollah Conflict "Achievable": Biden
content: US President Joe Biden believes there can still be a diplomatic resolution to escalating tensions between Israel and Hezbollah following a series of pager and walkie-talkie bombings, his spokeswoman said Thursday.
summary: US President Joe Biden believes there can still be a diplomatic resolution to escalating tensions between Israel and Hezbollah following a series of pager and walkie-talkie bombings, his spokeswoman said Thursday.

title: Sri Lanka Votes For New President On Saturday. All You Need To Know
content: The people of Sri Lanka are set to vote for a new president on Saturday in an election that will be key in deciding the future reforms in the country that is reeling under an unprecedented economic crisis.
summary: The people of Sri Lanka are set to vote for a new president on Saturday in an election that will be key in deciding the future reforms in the country that is reeling under an unprecedented economic crisis.

title: Workers At Musk's Tesla, SpaceX And X Donate To Harris While He Backs Trump
content: Billionaire Elon Musk has endorsed Republican former President Donald Trump in the race for the White House, but employees at his collection of companies are largely donating to Trump's Democratic rival Kamala Harris.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk has endorsed Republican former President Donald Trump in the race for the White House, but employees at his collection of companies are largely donating to Trump's Democratic rival Kamala Harris.

title: India Sends "Crucial Budgetary Support" To Maldives Amid Strained Ties
content: In a goodwill gesture, India on Thursday said it has decided to rollover a USD 50 million Treasury Bill for an additional year upon the request of the Maldives government.
summary: In a goodwill gesture, India on Thursday said it has decided to rollover a USD 50 million Treasury Bill for an additional year upon the request of the Maldives government.

title: 10-Year-Old Japanese Schoolboy Stabbed To Death In China
content: A child enrolled in a Japanese school in the Chinese city of Shenzhen has died after being stabbed on Wednesday, officials confirmed on Thursday, the second such attack near Japanese educational centres in China in recent months.
summary: A child enrolled in a Japanese school in the Chinese city of Shenzhen has died after being stabbed on Wednesday, officials confirmed on Thursday, the second such attack near Japanese educational centres in China in recent months.
